item.title: Harmonic Heritage & Starlit Brilliance (Yunlin, Taiwan)
item.description:
Program

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart: Diverdimento in E-flat Major, K. 563
    V. Minuetto, Allegretto - Trio - Trio II

Francis Poulenc: Sonate for Piano Four Hands (1939)
    I. Prelude
    II. Rustique
    III. Final

Max Bruch: 8 Pieces for Clarinet, Viola, and Piano, Op. 83
    V. Rumanische Melodie

Charles Gounod: Salut! demeure chaste et pure from Faust

Franz Lehar: Dein ist mein ganzes Herz from Das Land des Lachelns

Ludwig van Beethoven: Gassenhauer Trio for Clarinet, Cello, and Piano in B-flat Major, Op. 11
    III. Tema con variazioni (Pria ch’io I’impegno: Allegretto)

Franz Schubert: Der Hirt auf dem Felsen , D. 965 for Soprano, Clarinet, and Piano

Maurice Ravel: Sonata for Violin and Cello, M. 73
    IV. Vif, avec entrain

Charles Gounod: Je veux vivre from Romeo et Juliette

John Corigliano: Aria of the Worm from The Ghosts of Versailles

Giuseppe Verdi: Libiamo ne’ lieti calici from La traviata

Antonin Dvorak: Piano Quartet No. 2 in E-flat Major, Op. 87
    IV. Allegro ma non troppo

Musicians

    Chiao-Han Liao, piano
    Ellen Lee, piano
    Chueh-Yu Lai, soprano
    Yi-Wei Lin, tenor
    Hsuan-Hao Hsu, violin
    En-Chi Cheng, viola
    Tzu-Wei Huang, cello
    Chao-Chih Chen, clarinet

item.title: Wan Sha Chamber Music Series (Taipei, Taiwan)
item.description:
Program

Pyotr Tchaikovsky: Piano Trio in A Minor, Op. 50
    Oscar Lin, piano
    Hsuan-Hao Hsu, violin
    Simon Thompson, cello

Sergei Taneyev: Piano Quintet in G Minor, Op. 30
    Oscar Lin, piano
    Hsuan-Hao Hsu, violin
    Hsin-Yun Wu, violin
    En-Chi Cheng, viola
    Simon Thompson, cello

item.title: Chamber Music Conference - Faculty Concert (Hamilton, NY, USA)
item.description:
Program

Joseph Haydn: String Quartet in C Major, Op. 20, No. 2
    Yezu Woo, violin
    Mayuki Fukuhara, violin
    En-Chi Cheng, viola
    Laura Metcalf, cello

John Harbison: Songs America Loves to Sing (selections)
    Giorgio Consolati, flute/piccolo
    Guy Yehuda, clarinet
    Sheila Reinhold, violin
    Carol Ou, cello
    Catalin Dima, piano

item.title: Strings in the Sanctuary - A Memorial Day Concert (New York, NY, USA)
item.description:
Program

Walfgang Amadeus Mozart: String Quartet in G Major, K. 156 (K. 134B)

Dmitri Shostakovich: String Quartet No. 8 in C Minor, Op. 110

Antonin Dvorak: String Quartet No. 12 in F Major, Op. 96, “American”

    Christiana Liberis, violin
    Filip Pogady, violin
    En-Chi Cheng, viola
    Adrian Daurov, cello
